attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A scheme should be set up where would-be purchasers of property should be enforced to submit a suitable 'deposit', to show their commitment to a sale, and to discourage time-wasters. Any incidental costs incurred by the seller for that particular purchaser could be subsidised from the deposit if they withdraw.
The deposit to be returned, in full, upon completion.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
